subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Note that this character is identical to the [[劄#Alternative forms|form used]] in Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau for {{l|mul|劄}} (U+5284).

subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|[[札]]}} ''(Orthodox form of ''<font size=4, lang=zh-Hans>[[剳#Translingual|剳]], [[劄#Translingual|劄]]</font>'' in mainland China)'' <!-- Refer Character 3532, https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表 -->
* <big>{{l|mul|[[剳]]}}</big> ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant form}} of {{l|mul|札}} in mainland China. Variant form of ''<font size=4, lang=zh-Hant>[[劄#Translingual|劄]]</font>'' in Taiwan)'' <!-- Refer https://www.moedict.tw/剳 -->
* <big>{{l|mul|[[劄]]}}</big> ''(Preferred form used in Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau. Also a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} of {{l|mul|札}} in mainland China)''
